snippet: In 23 seasons, Pedro Valdes, 39, has played for 18 teams, in 13 leagues and in five countries. Now with Puerto Rico, Valdes plans to retire after the World Baseball Classic.
abstract: Profile of veteran designated hitter Pedro Valdes, who spent bits of three season in major leagues over his 23-year career, which spans 18 teams, 13 leagues and five countries; Valdes says he will retire after playing for Puerto Rico in World Baseball Classic.
lead_paragraph: In 23 seasons, Pedro Valdes, 39, has played for 18 teams, in 13 leagues and in five countries. Now with Puerto Rico, Valdes plans to retire after the World Baseball Classic.

headline.seo: Pedro Valdes: The Baseball Journeyman’s Journeyman
headline.main: For a Baseball Traveling Man, an Unexpected Stop
headline.print_headline: For a Baseball Traveling Man, an Unexpected Stop
